## The Paris Agreement: A Simple Summary

The Paris Agreement is a global promise to fight climate change. Almost every country agreed to limit global warming to well below 2°C, ideally 1.5°C. To do this, they pledged to cut down on harmful gases and aim for net-zero emissions by 2050.

The agreement encourages countries to adapt to climate change and helps them access funding. While it's a big step forward, some people think it needs to be tougher.
